promptForName: Generate a unique, original, creative, single-word name for a massive basic goat steel-type pokemon with ancient antlers. It can be found in mountain-like environments. Do not use the words pokemon, steel or goat. Ony answer with the generated name
promptForDescription: Generate a short, original, creative Pokedex description for Stagolith, a a massive basic goat steel-type pokemon. It can be found in mountain-like environments It has the following abilities: Steel Melt. Be creative about its day-to-day life. Do not use the words "goat", "steel" or "Stagolith". Use a maximum of 150 characters. Only answer with the generated description.
promptForVisual: mdjrny-v4 style portrait of steel-type pokemon, goat-like, basic, digital art, sugimori, chibi, centered, full body, grey ambient lighting
generatedDescription: Behold the towering Capriform Armoil! Fabled to devour boulders, it liquefies metal effortlessly. In daily life, it scales cliffs with grace.
